news.title: Bright Eyes Announce EP, Share Video for New Song Featuring Hurray for the Riff Raff: Watch
news.summary: Conor Oberst and his bandmates will share Kids Table in September

news.title: Iceage’s Elias Rønnenfelt Announces New Album Speak Daggers, Shares Video for New Song: Watch
news.summary: The Danish singer-songwriter enlists the Congos, Erika de Casier, and Fine for his second solo LP, led by “USA Baby”

news.title: Chat Pile and Hayden Pedigo Announce Album, Share Video for New Song: Watch
news.summary: “Radioactive Dreams” leads the collaborative In the Earth Again

news.title: Sharp Pins Announces New Album, Shares Video for New Song “(I Wanna) Be Your Girl”: Watch
news.summary: Balloon Balloon Balloon follows Kai Slater’s recent breakout album Radio DDR

news.title: The xx’s Oliver Sim Shares Video for New Song “Obsession”: Watch
news.summary: Sim’s first single in three years was produced by Bullion and Jockstrap’s Taylor Skye
